caseTitle: Haji Tooti v. The Federal Board of Revenue & others
authorJudge: (1) Mr. Justice Munib Akhtar (2) Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: The extent and scope, as well as the nature (legislative and administrative) of the orders issued by the Federal Board of Revenue under Sections 181 and 223 of the Customs Act 1969 (“Act”), explained.
